select b.no, b.parent_no as parentNo, ifnull(b.parent_no, b.no) as _parentNo, b.name, date_format(b.last_update, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as lastUpdate from menu a right join menu b on a.no = b.parent_no order by _parentNo, b.parent_no, b.order_no;
